question: What is the measurement of Line_I_M_0?
qt_description: Line Line_I_M_0 (Description: Connect vertex I with midpoint M_0 (of line L3))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 6-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/6 radians. Total 1 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: 6-sided polygon (center O1) scaled by 1/2. Found 13 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 12, total arcs: 0, total points: 13.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect vertex I with midpoint M_0 (of line L3)
api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a regular hexagon centered at O1 with side length 5 is drawn, rotated by π/6 radians. A concentric, scaled-down hexagon (scaled by 1/2) is inscribed within it, sharing the same center O1. The two hexagons together define 13 distinct points, including vertices and intersections. In the first and only enhancement round, a line segment is drawn connecting vertex I of the inner hexagon to M_0, the midpoint of side L3 (which corresponds to side DE of the outer hexagon). 

What is the length of segment IM_0?
